description: Try our easy to follow Curried Sausage Casserole recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Curried sausage,Quick & easy dinner,High fibre,Sausage,High protein,Winter,Low sugar,Beef
name: Curried Sausage Casserole Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat half the oil in large flameproof casserole dish over high heat. Cook sausages, turning, for 5 minutes or until browned. Remove from dish and thickly slice diagonally.
Meanwhile, combine cornflour, stock cubes and 1/4 cup cold water in a jug. Once combined, stir in a further 1 1/2 cups cold water.

Heat remaining oil in same dish over mediumhigh heat. Cook onion and garlic, stirring, for 4 minutes or until onion has softened. Add curry powder, then cook, stirring, for 1 minute or until fragrant.

Stir stock mixture, then add to dish. Bring to the boil. Return sausages to dish. Reduce heat to low and simmer, uncovered, for 10 minutes, turning sausages occasionally or until they are cooked through, adding vegetables to dish for the last 4 minutes of cooking.
Meanwhile, heat mashed potatoes according to packet instructions. Divide mash among plates. Top with sausages, vegetables and sauce. Serve scattered with parsley.
